subject: Withdrawal of Policy Circular No. 12.37/2025 dated 12.02.2025 on ‘SOP/ Guidelines for approval of Capacity Augmentation; Road Safety and Strengthening/ Overlay Works’-reg.
text: HRal 74y <THTf qifearut (Tsm 4Rdev &r TvHr 4FT, MT TaR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways; Goverment of India) Frria Ja #-5 Q 6, #42r-10, ERa; #@d _ 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Road Safetyl 2025 Policy Circular No. 12.39/2025 dated O6th June, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/DOP/2022/ (Comp. No. 152962)} Sub: Withdrawal of   Policy Circular No. 12.37/2025 dated 12.02.2025 on 'SOPI Guidelines for approval of Capacity Augmentation, Road Safety and Strengthening/ Overlay Works'-reg: It has been decided to withdraw the Policy Circular No. 12.37/2025 dated 12.02.2025 (Annexure-1) on SOP/ Guidelines for approval of Capacity Augmentation, Road Safety and Strengthening= Overlay Works.  Accordingly, Policy Circular No. 12.37/2025 dated 12.02.2025 stands withdrawn: 2 This issue with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above. Tcloelys (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Ic Chief General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 . Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 . Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation. NHAL Copy
